metadata.title: CVE-2021-47518 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: nfc:fix potential NULL pointer deref in nfc_genl_dump_ses_done The done()netlink callback nfc_genl_dump_ses_done() should check if received argumentis non-NULL, because its allocation could fail earlier in dumpit()(nfc_genl_dump_ses()).

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.

linux-aws-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
